thread.title: Vaani Kapoor to be cast opposite Ranveer Singh in 'Befikre'?
thread.title_full: Vaani Kapoor to be cast opposite Ranveer Singh in 'Befikre'? - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Vaani Kapoor to be cast opposite Ranveer Singh in 'Befikre'?
text:
After her Bollywood debut in 'Shuddh Desi Romance' (2013), Vaani Kapoor has found herself at a loose end.

Vaani Kapoor 
Though the actress did a Tamil film 'Aaha Kalyanam' (2014), she has been missing from the Bollywood scene.

Ranveer Singh 
The Yash Raj discovery, if the grapevine is to be believed, might be roped in for Aditya Chopra's upcoming film, 'Befikre', opposite Ranveer Singh. As the makers prefer to be tightlipped about their upcoming projects, there is speculation about the cast with a lot of names being tossed around.
Vaani has waited for long for her second Bollywood film and her patience might just pay off.
